rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming foyer near the main entrance. Vastu compliant with entry facing East to invite positive energy, but adjust as necessary for West-facing plot.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious open area with Mediterranean-style decor, large windows for natural light and ventilation. West-facing to align with the plot orientation.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Formal dining area adjacent to the living room, designed for family gatherings and entertaining guests.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Mediterranean-style kitchen with functional layout, including an island if possible. Vastu guidelines advise placing the cooking area in the southeast corner for positive energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The largest bedroom designed with ample closet space and a private balcony facing East for morning light, following Vastu.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom with personal space and built-in storage solutions.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for extended family or guests, ensuring ample space and privacy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom in the layout to meet the 6BHK requirement, optimized for functionality.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Fifth bedroom with space for study or relaxation area; adheres to Vastu by providing a balance of light and privacy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 6
rooms.description: Sixth bedroom designed to serve as a guest room or office, ensuring proper ventilation and light.

openings.description: Primary entry door aligned with Vastu recommendations, ensuring positive energy flow. May require minor adjustments for West-facing plot.
Two-car garage opening designed to integrate with the main structure; positioned conveniently near the kitchen or living area.

garage.description: The two-car garage is integrated into the design, ensuring easy access and adherence to local building norms.
